casebody.data:
AYERS
v.
CLEVELAND 2018-0852 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 3, 2018

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motions for admission pro hac vice of Alex M. Grabowski, Samuel B. Isaacson, Debra Loevy, Scott Rauscher, Anand Swaminathan, and Matt Topic. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
